text: "Borderline" is a popular song by American singer Madonna, released in 1984. ==Charts== Chart (1984) Best position Australia Kent Music Report 12 Belgian VRT Top 30 4 Canadian RPM Singles Chart 25 Dutch Top 40 3 Irish Singles Chart 1 New Zealand Singles Chart 47 Swiss Singles Chart 23 UK Singles Chart 2 US Billboard Hot 100 10 US Hot Adult Contemporary 23 US Hot Dance Music/Club Play 2 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Madonna songs Category:Jody Watley songs Category:The Flaming Lips songs
title: Borderline (Madonna song)
